issue.title: dtf.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://dtf.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fdtf.ru) ### Comment > With adguard enabled or route traffic through adguard for DTF app can't open any article, newsfeed not loads, can't login. Push notification works. The only fix is to disable routing this app through adguard. Disable HTTP > or HTTPS filtering gives no result. Username: `@cyber-g0d` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2ihiswh26dc0g8sgosg44wkcg8go0o4bre37ijhvs0.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gu57hwavu9wk0oswcck8kwsoscossg8pyb57epsxc0.jpg?nc=1)
